variable.name: FSASDATE
variable.description: Form date as SAS date value

variable.name: FORM
variable.description: DCCT form number

variable.name: DGB1A
variable.description: Patient has plans to move soon

variable.name: DGB1B
variable.description: Month and year of intended move

variable.name: DGB1C
variable.description: Patient is able to visit once a week after move if required

variable.name: DGB1D
variable.description: Patient thinks he/she would continue clinic visits at another clinic

variable.name: DGB2
variable.description: Patient is able to visit once a week now if required

variable.name: DGB3
variable.description: Patient got to clinic today by (car, Taxi, bus, walked, other)

variable.name: DGB4
variable.description: Patient had trouble getting to clinic today

variable.name: DGB5
variable.description: Patient has any transportation problems (ever)

variable.name: DGB6A
variable.description: Patient has children

variable.name: DGB6B
variable.description: Patient has problems getting childcare (ever)

variable.name: DGB8
variable.description: Employer's flexibility about giving time off for doctor's appointments

variable.name: DGB9
variable.description: Patient needs to take vacation or sick time

variable.name: DGB10
variable.description: Patient has day-time telephone number

variable.name: DGC2
variable.description: How often did patient not follow insulin injection plan during last month

variable.name: DGC3
variable.description: How often did patient decide not to take insulin injection during last month

variable.name: DGC4
variable.description: How often did patient decide not to follow glucose testing (blood/urine) schedule during last month

variable.name: DGC5
variable.description: How often did patient go through a day without glucose testing (blood/urine) during last month

variable.name: DGC6
variable.description: How often during last month did patient not follow his/her meal plan

variable.name: DGC7
variable.description: How often during last month did patient decide not to follow his/her meal plan

variable.name: DGC8
variable.description: Work or school interfere with adherence to treatment plan

variable.name: DGC9
variable.description: Vacation interferes with following treatment plan

variable.name: DGC10
variable.description: Social situations interfere with adherence to treatment plan

variable.name: DGC11
variable.description: Family life interferes with adherence to treatment plan

variable.name: DGC12
variable.description: How often during past year did patient not follow treatment plan because of illness

variable.name: DGD1
variable.description: Patient has strong preference for one or other treatment group

variable.name: DGD2
variable.description: Patient is willing to accept random treatment group assignment

variable.name: DGD3A
variable.description: Expected gains from participating in DCCT: expected blood sugar changes

variable.name: DGD3B
variable.description: Expected gains from participating in DCCT: expected complications

variable.name: DGD3C
variable.description: Expected gains from participating in DCCT: expected general well-being

variable.name: DGD4
variable.description: Patient's attitude toward public use of necessary medical equipment

variable.name: DGD5
variable.description: Expected DCCT effect on current daily routine

variable.name: DGD6
variable.description: Expected DCCT effect on family

variable.name: MASK_PAT
variable.description: Patient ID number
